findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeAccount()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner can change charity address (only applicable before renouncing ownership).
